title: Trx3
author: Trx3
content: I am planning on buying 2000 SANDBOX tokens this month, what is your price prediction for this project? Do you believe that metaverse hype is still very well alive?

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: Quote from: Trx3 on February 04, 2023, 05:54:30 PMI am planning on buying 2000 SANDBOX tokens this month, what is your price prediction for this project? Do you believe that metaverse hype is still very well alive? As long as bitcoin keeps growing up and you can expect the price to go up as well. The metaverse hype will come back again once bitcoin will able to go to the around 35k - 40k range. I meant we will see that happen anyone would be interested to join in the metaverse. My question is why did you decide to buy sand token once the price has been going up? I think that it's too late to buy it but if you are using it for long term and sandbox was good token for that purpose.

comments.author: o48o
comments.created_time: February 05, 2023, 02:36:13 PMLast edit: February 06, 2023, 08:13:59 PM by o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Trx3 on February 04, 2023, 05:54:30 PMI am planning on buying 2000 SANDBOX tokens this month, what is your price prediction for this project? Do you believe that metaverse hype is still very well alive? If you believe that these metaverses around are really around in the future then yeah. From all this sort of gamified metaverses around i root for sandbox. It's well done and imho way more appealing then decentraland. It's really hard to predict if these platforms stick as i think they are pretty much duct tape solutions for fast as possible metaverse adoption. I think that there will be better tech ahead and these get left far behind like some bulky and weird tv and radio combinations in the past.Just be aware that a whale might Be dumping it soon

comments.author: SUPERSAIAN
comments.body: Metaverse is definitely not a scam. There are many projects that build this medium on deception. The metaverse has been successful depending on how it is used, trust exists in projects. Sandbox is a project with a lot of audience and players. I experienced it once for an event, even though I didn't complete the event, I took my first metaverse step in the sandbox. I think a viable project has many strong partners, they get enough attention at the events.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I am no longer a fan of Metaverse. It's just a buzzword that has been on trend and became timely with the pump that it has made during the bull run.I guess if those legitimate projects that have amazing plans for their future have been able to retain most of their investors, then many of them are still alive.As for your investment with 2000 sandbox, if you've DYOR, you'll know your answer and it's your decision.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on February 05, 2023, 02:36:13 PMIt's really hard to predict if these platforms stick as i think they are pretty much duct tape solutions for fast as possible metaverse adoption. I think that there will be better tech ahead and these get left far behind like some bulky and weird tv and radio combinations in the past.Just be aware that a whale might Be dumping it soon This is definitely not a good idea to buy this token right now, after seeing the news whales are moving large chunks of SAND to Binance. The risk to be taken doesn't worth considering the currently scenario. It's better to wait and see what these whales have in mind and what they are going to do with their tokens next, before making any moves. In times like this it's possible whales liquidate their tokens in order to raise funds to boost bitcoin price, starting a new rally.

comments.author: FanEagle
comments.body: Quote from: uneng on February 06, 2023, 09:20:23 PMQuote from: o48o on February 05, 2023, 02:36:13 PMIt's really hard to predict if these platforms stick as i think they are pretty much duct tape solutions for fast as possible metaverse adoption. I think that there will be better tech ahead and these get left far behind like some bulky and weird tv and radio combinations in the past.Just be aware that a whale might Be dumping it soon This is definitely not a good idea to buy this token right now, after seeing the news whales are moving large chunks of SAND to Binance. The risk to be taken doesn't worth considering the currently scenario. It's better to wait and see what these whales have in mind and what they are going to do with their tokens next, before making any moves. In times like this it's possible whales liquidate their tokens in order to raise funds to boost bitcoin price, starting a new rally.We are still in a bear market right now so all coins are still down and it was still a good moment to buy them. I know not all coins that are cheap is a must to avail since many of them are just scams but I think this SAND coin is different from them. I know this was one of the early Metaverse/NFT projects that have been created.It was one of the top NFT/Metaverse projects during their peak but I think even until now, if we check on the rankings of that category. Once the bull market returns, legit projects like this can surely recover. Whales dumping the coin can be normal and they are only doing it for manipulating purposes but there is no need to panic as long as the main project itself isn't experiencing a major issue.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Honestly I think metaverse in general still have good chance, it's just they are waiting for the next bullrun for their next releases, there's many cases of developers waiting until the next bullrun so that their project new update and release could somehow help increasing the value of their token, but considering that there are rumours regarding whales that's gonna be dumping this token, well I guess you should invest in some other metaverse instead, that's until these whales finished dumping their coins in which gonna drives the value of sand lower.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: metaverse is still at an early stage and sandbox is one most well know projects and is listed in dozen of centralized exchange so if i were you i will buy it but always know the risk that it could be wrong too. if bitcoin price keep growing maybe we have small bull run on august

comments.author: Arohi mim
comments.body: As long as bitcoin keeps growing up and you can expect the price to go up as well. The metaverse hype will come back again once bitcoin will able to go to the around 35k - 40k range. I meant we will see that happen anyone would be interested to join in the metaverse. My question is why did you decide to buy sand token once the price has been going up? I think that it's too late to buy it but if you are using it for long term and sandbox was good token for that purpose.

comments.author: bbc.reporter
comments.body: Quote from: uneng on February 06, 2023, 09:20:23 PMQuote from: o48o on February 05, 2023, 02:36:13 PMIt's really hard to predict if these platforms stick as i think they are pretty much duct tape solutions for fast as possible metaverse adoption. I think that there will be better tech ahead and these get left far behind like some bulky and weird tv and radio combinations in the past.Just be aware that a whale might Be dumping it soon This is definitely not a good idea to buy this token right now, after seeing the news whales are moving large chunks of SAND to Binance. The risk to be taken doesn't worth considering the currently scenario. It's better to wait and see what these whales have in mind and what they are going to do with their tokens next, before making any moves. In times like this it's possible whales liquidate their tokens in order to raise funds to boost bitcoin price, starting a new rally.Also according to some people in social media, Sand will have a big vesting unlock on February 14. I am quite certain there is more chance of this to be dumped after that date. However, traders can join the pump before the vesting unlock and dump hours before this hehehe. There will certainly be good announcements that will be published to hype this project, pump the token and make it ready for an exit dump.This is one of these types announcements. They will be vague without real details shared. If you are a trader, it might be profitable to have an unlock calendar on projects and trade the unlock exit pumps hehehehee.Metaverse gaming platform The Sandbox and Saudi Arabia have come to an understanding of some sort. Details were not provided.Sandbox co-founder and COO Sebastien Borget took to LinkedIn to announce the news. “It was a true honor to sign our [memorandum of understanding] partnership … between The Sandbox and the Saudi Arabia Digital Government Authority,” he wrote. “We look forward to exploring, advising and supporting mutually each other in activations of the Metaverse!”Source https://www.theblock.co/post/209458/saudi-arabia-the-sandbox-agree-to-collaborate-on-metaverse-projects

comments.author: wajik-tempe
comments.body: I still have confident positive expectation about metaverse future, but still the level of interest and adoption of metaverse technology will likely depend on a number of factors such as the level of investment and support from both the private and public sectors.Whether the metaverse hype is still alive and whether it will lead to growth and success for specific projects, including SANDBOX

comments.author: Psynthax
comments.body: the current circumstance of sand doesn't look good from the information presented by many above, vesting added with whales getting ready to make huge sell off you'd think it will hit all time lows eventually.so I guess if you could refrain from investing and wait it out until it hits new lows then it should be better, moreover there are many alternatives so you could still make profits will waiting if you're so eager investing in this coin even though it seems metaverse isn't really the trend anymore.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: bbc.reporter on February 08, 2023, 02:54:32 AMMetaverse gaming platform The Sandbox and Saudi Arabia have come to an understanding of some sort. Details were not provided.Sandbox co-founder and COO Sebastien Borget took to LinkedIn to announce the news. “It was a true honor to sign our [memorandum of understanding] partnership … between The Sandbox and the Saudi Arabia Digital Government Authority,” he wrote. “We look forward to exploring, advising and supporting mutually each other in activations of the Metaverse!”Source https://www.theblock.co/post/209458/saudi-arabia-the-sandbox-agree-to-collaborate-on-metaverse-projectsWith this i am sensing some serious money flows coming in. Saudi money is in whole different level and first thing that came to mind was collaboration with the smart city called "The Line".https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Line,_Saudi_ArabiaProjects like that can give a glimpse how much money are they dealing with.However them being Saudi Arabia i am thinking they would have some ideas with censorship and any critizism of politics could end up being a problem.

comments.author: carlfebz2
comments.body: Quote from: bittick on February 04, 2023, 11:38:32 PMQuote from: Trx3 on February 04, 2023, 05:54:30 PMI am planning on buying 2000 SANDBOX tokens this month, what is your price prediction for this project? Do you believe that metaverse hype is still very well alive? As long as bitcoin keeps growing up and you can expect the price to go up as well. The metaverse hype will come back again once bitcoin will able to go to the around 35k - 40k range. I meant we will see that happen anyone would be interested to join in the metaverse. My question is why did you decide to buy sand token once the price has been going up? I think that it's too late to buy it but if you are using it for long term and sandbox was good token for that purpose. Lots of things had been dragged down on the time that bitcoins price plummets or dumps or simply we are on a bear state which is really that very common for whatever hypes earlier would really be greatly affectedwhether it would be Defi/metaverse or something that is currently in hype. When it comes to choosing on coins or projects then it would really be that varying on each person because not all would really be that confident on choosing some potential projects.You wont gain up something if you wont really take up some risks which is really the primary rule on investment world.Its up to yourself on which one you would be choosing and since its your money then it would be your right on which one you would be choosing.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: SUPERSAIAN on February 06, 2023, 04:42:52 PMMetaverse is definitely not a scam. There are many projects that build this medium on deception. The metaverse has been successful depending on how it is used, trust exists in projects. Sandbox is a project with a lot of audience and players. I experienced it once for an event, even though I didn't complete the event, I took my first metaverse step in the sandbox. I think a viable project has many strong partners, they get enough attention at the events.Metaverse is a concept and definitely never be a scam. The one who will turn out to be scam is the projects who are developing and promised to be a future metaverse. Companies has started to make their own metaverse and some projects has already have one and they are making the public experience it, same with the experience you have on sandbox. Sandbox got a huge support from the community and it will depend on their future releases if the project they are doing is what the community is expecting since there are projects that launched their metaverse that turned into disappointment. Metaverse is highly anticipated and has a possible good future in it.

comments.author: bbc.reporter
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on February 08, 2023, 11:12:00 PMQuote from: bbc.reporter on February 08, 2023, 02:54:32 AMMetaverse gaming platform The Sandbox and Saudi Arabia have come to an understanding of some sort. Details were not provided.Sandbox co-founder and COO Sebastien Borget took to LinkedIn to announce the news. “It was a true honor to sign our [memorandum of understanding] partnership … between The Sandbox and the Saudi Arabia Digital Government Authority,” he wrote. “We look forward to exploring, advising and supporting mutually each other in activations of the Metaverse!”Source https://www.theblock.co/post/209458/saudi-arabia-the-sandbox-agree-to-collaborate-on-metaverse-projectsWith this i am sensing some serious money flows coming in. Saudi money is in whole different level and first thing that came to mind was collaboration with the smart city called "The Line".https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Line,_Saudi_ArabiaProjects like that can give a glimpse how much money are they dealing with.However them being Saudi Arabia i am thinking they would have some ideas with censorship and any critizism of politics could end up being a problem.It appears that you did not understand. There is very much of a chance that this news about Saudi Arabia is nothing but to hype Sandbox and cause a pump on Sand tokens before the vesting unlock on February 14. It might only be an exit pump for those new tokens taken into circulation to dump. The other projects with token unlocks might also start doing something similar to this hehehe.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Trx3 on February 04, 2023, 05:54:30 PMI am planning on buying 2000 SANDBOX tokens this month, what is your price prediction for this project? Do you believe that metaverse hype is still very well alive? Unlike other types of coins I believe that metaverse coins are going to be part of this market for a very long time, what you need to ask yourself is if you think sandbox is going to be around at least until 2024 or 2025 when the bull market will begin to materialize, if this is the case then it could be a good idea to invest some money in it, but if this period of time is too long and you think another metaverse project could captivate the community then maybe this is the time to wait and see how things move.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Trx3 on February 04, 2023, 05:54:30 PMI am planning on buying 2000 SANDBOX tokens this month, what is your price prediction for this project? Do you believe that metaverse hype is still very well alive? Include on your planning to analyze SANDBOX before you invest, because the market is unpredictable and we can’t guarantee you that any predictions here are correct. Metaverse is still new and still trying to get back the attention to them, so there’s a good chance for this project to rise again but maybe it will take some time. As long as you are willing to take the risk, then maybe you can this one and wait for your target price.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on February 11, 2023, 09:39:12 PMQuote from: Trx3 on February 04, 2023, 05:54:30 PMI am planning on buying 2000 SANDBOX tokens this month, what is your price prediction for this project? Do you believe that metaverse hype is still very well alive? Include on your planning to analyze SANDBOX before you invest, because the market is unpredictable and we can’t guarantee you that any predictions here are correct. Metaverse is still new and still trying to get back the attention to them, so there’s a good chance for this project to rise again but maybe it will take some time. As long as you are willing to take the risk, then maybe you can this one and wait for your target price. You are correct in that but how many people do perform good research on new projects? Metaverse is getting more popular so we will probably see more and more coins focusing about that. Personally, I haven't heard about Sandbox before and I am also not interested in it.
